#summary How to Build OMD
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

This page documents how to build OMD 

Opensource Multibody Dynamics (OMD) is written in C++ and uses cmake so you can use your favorite IDE.

= Details =

1. Use SVN to check out the code.  If you use Windows, you will probably want this:

http://tortoisesvn.net/downloads.html

The command to check out the code base:
svn checkout https://omd.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ omd 

2.  Get Eigen.  
http://eigen.tuxfamily.org/index.php?title=Main_Page

OMD uses the Eigen math library.  To build, OMD has to be able to find Eigen.

3.  Get CMake
http://eigen.tuxfamily.org/index.php?title=Main_Page
